TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RunState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The RunState enum indicates whether a test can be executed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Api.RunState Explicit = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The test can only be run explicitly.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Api.RunState Ignored = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The test has been ignored. May appear on a Test, when the IgnoreAttribute is used.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Api.RunState NotRunnable = int32(0)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Api.RunState Skipped = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The test has been skipped. This value may appear on a Test when certain attributes are used to skip the test.
